== Cliser Config ==

<code>
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!-- Author: Alexander Villalobos YadrÃ³ -->
<cliser-config>
    <cliser-init>
        <tracert-logs id="DMS-CPanel - V1.0">
            <active>true</active>
            <out-type>FILE</out-type>
            <filename>DmsCPanel-1.0-</filename>
        </tracert-logs>
        <controller-param-name>ctrl</controller-param-name>
        <!-- cross-context-path>/dmsdestruction</cross-context-path -->        
        <session-name>DMS-CPANEL-SESSION</session-name>
        <iu>getLogin</iu>
        <db-protocol version="10g">ORACLE</db-protocol>
        <date-format>dd/MM/yyyy</date-format>
        <resource-locations>
            <value></value>
        </resource-locations>
    </cliser-init>
    <!--- WORKFLOW -->
    <business-logic package="mx.com.adea.workflow.bl">
        <bl>Workflow</bl>
        <bl>WorkflowState</bl>
        <bl>WorkflowEvent</bl>
        <bl>WorkflowConfig</bl>
        <bl>WorkflowSecurity</bl>
    </business-logic>
    <!-- DMS -->    
    <business-logic package="mx.com.adea.dms.bl">
        <bl>Template</bl>
        <bl>Group</bl>
        <bl>Category</bl>
        <bl>Document</bl>
        <bl>Rule</bl>
        <bl>IncidentType</bl>
        <bl>CheckList</bl>
        <bl>Product</bl>
        <bl>OperationProduct</bl>
        <bl>ChecklistRule</bl>
        <bl>Incident</bl>
        <bl>IncidentRule</bl>
        <bl>Customer</bl>
    </business-logic>
    <!-- SECURITY -->
    <business-logic package="mx.com.adea.security.bl">
        <bl>Login</bl>
    </business-logic>
</cliser-config>
</code>
